title: Sweet and sour chicken
ingredients: ['500g (1 1/4 lb) skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets - diced', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1/2 green pepper, sliced', '1/2 red pepper, sliced', '2 carrots, jullienned', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '4 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 small tin pineapple pieces, juice reserved', '1 tablespoon rice vinegar', '1 tablespoon light brown soft sugar', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger']
